name: Quadrant
overview: A seemingly-impossible Connect 4 game, with outstanding graphics and music. You must drop your silver spheres, Tetris-style, to get four in a row in any direction to eliminate that line. Trouble is, the computer player has the advantage of dropping two of his parts in one go and some pieces will change the colors of previously dropped pieces. Published in Game On 1993/11, 64'er 1995/07, and in 64'er 1999/08.
